app-title: Kafen samun Ilimi da yada shi
app-description: Zaka iya samun Ilimi kyauta a cikin yaruka 300+ dake fadin duniya a kafan manhajan wikipedia
content-license: Akwai abunda ake nema a cikin nan CC BY-SA 3.0 sai dai idan baa lura ba
confirm-app-close-message: Ka tabbata kanason fita daga app ɗin?
language-setting-message: Canza yaren anan zai iya canza yaren cikin manhajan gaba daya.zaka iya canza yaren akan ko wani makala ta banyan amfani da jadawalin canza mukala.
softkey-refresh: Sa wani jin dadi/ korewa wani gajiya
onboarding-0-description: Kudin Ilimi na Wikipedia wajene da ake samun Ilimi kyauta wanda ya hada marubutan sakai a fadin duniya gaba daya.
onboarding-1-description: Zabi yaren dakafi so ko kuma yarukan da zaka iya dubawa dashi kuma ka karanta
onboarding-2-description: Karanta mukaloli fiye da dubu hamsin about mutane, wurare, da kuma abubuwan daga sassan duniya. Sababbin labarai da kuma sabbin mukaloli da ake sanyawa kullum.
tip-read-message: Yi amfani da mahada ko wani damage ka karanta mukaloli a cikin harsuna da yawa, kalli hotuna, da sauransu.
tip-search-message: Shiga a akwatin dubawa ka karanta mukaloli akan mutane, wurare, da kuma abubuwan daga fadin duniya gaba daya.
tip-switch-message: Ya amfani da key din hagu ko dama domin ka zabi mahada a cikin mukala don kara fadada ilimin ka.
tip-about-message: Kudin Ilimin wikipedia wajene da ake samun Ilimi kyauta wanda marutan Sakai a fadin duniya suka hadu.
view-in-browser: Duba mukala a cikin injin bincike
about-app-message: Gidauniyan wikipedia ne suka hada tare da taimakon mai aikin sakai kamar ka.
feedback-explanation: Zamuyi amfani da ra'ayin ka/sakamakon ka don inganta wannan manhajan. Sakamakon ra"ayinka zaa aje shi tsawon kwanaki casa'in, har mu gama binciken mu $1 da $2
feedback-cancel: Ka tabbata kanaso ka fita? Duk bayananka zasu bace
